definition: to feel anxious about sth/unable to stop thinking about sth/to miss
to lead along/to pull (an animal on a tether)/(bound form) to involve/to draw in
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: Wherever you are- I will miss you.
sentences.chinese: 不論你在哪裏，我都會牽記你。

sentences.english: I'll miss you too, my friends.
sentences.chinese: 我也會牽記你們這些同伴的。

sentences.english: Alone a person occasionally thought of in the night that, did not have the former days missing actually.
sentences.chinese: 隻身一人在夜深臨時牽記，卻沒有了昔時的顧慮。
